Class SingleEffectsCombinationActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.controller.SingleEffectsCombinationActions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SingleEffectsCombinationActions
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class creates objects that represent the things a player must choose from to use a certain effect

      • validate

        public void validate(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> effectsCombination)
              throws UnavailableEffectCombinationException
        this method checks if the targets calculated are ok by: - checking if there are targets - checking if the combination selected if fully offerable
        Throws:
        UnavailableEffectCombinationException - when an effect combination is not ok

      • validateCellsWithTargets

        private boolean validateCellsWithTargets()
        if there are no targets on every cell there's something wrong : it will return true returns false otherwise
